# labNorm

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/labNorm)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=labNorm)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `labNorm` is to easily compute normalized values for standard lab results. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of labNorm like so:

``` r
retmotes::install_github("tanaylab/labNorm")
```
